title:
A Special Senatorial Event
Just for Council Members

location.text: Rosewood Crescent Hotel, 400 Crescent Ct., Dallas, TX 75201

body: As the echoes of the 2014 mid-term election campaign fade, Council members have a unique opportunity to hear what all the shouting was about from a man who is keenly interested in the affairs of the nation, U.S. Senator Ted Cruz (R-Texas).
The highlight of this special luncheon program will be a discussion of timely national and international topics with the senator.
Reserve your place at this extraordinary event!
